attributes.action: Create a voluntary central register of gamblers that credit agencies will have to check beofre granting credit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A voluntary central register of gamblers should be created which would operate in the following way.

Gamblers voluntary register themselves on the register and nominate a financial guardian.  Any agency giving credits to individuals within the UK would then have to run a check against the central register similar to what they do for bankruptcy and would only be able grant credit with written permission from the financial guardian.

The gambler could only be removed from the central register with the written permission of the financial guardian.

This could be operated in a similar way as bankruptcy searches are done at present, or as an extra field on the credit agencies.
